pageContext.claim: “Getting out of Syria was no surprise. I've been campaigning on it for years, and six months ago, when I very publicly wanted to do it, I agreed to stay longer. Russia, Iran, Syria & others are the local enemy of ISIS. We were doing there work. Time to come home & rebuild.”
pageContext.analysis: A day earlier, Trump insisted ISIS had been defeated in Syria. Today, he flip-flops and says that it has not been defeated but it's up to U.S. adversaries such as Russian and Iran  to finish the job.
